message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $175.
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $120 is lower than I'm hoping for, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $140? This is still a great deal for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $140 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. That's the lowest I can go.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $130 just doesn't cover my costs. How about we meet in the middle at $135? I'm willing to make this final concession to get this deal done.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. That's the best I can do.
